a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Monthly CO₂ emissions from commercial passenger flights, Jan 15, 2019 to
Domestic aviation represents flights which depart and arrive within the same country. International aviation emissions are
assigned to the country of departure.

g.text: Monthly CO₂ emissions from international aviationMonthly CO₂ emissions from international aviation
Monthly CO₂ emissions from domestic aviationMonthly CO₂ emissions from domestic aviation
Monthly CO₂ total emissions from aviationMonthly CO₂ total emissions from aviation

text.tspan: Data source: Clarke et al. (2022) via OECD
